# grantory_hosts (Data Source)
Use this data source to filter Grantory records inside a Terraform/OpenTofu plan.

## Example
```terraform
data "grantory_hosts" "app" {
  host_id = "app01"
}
```


## Schema

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `labels` (Map of String) Labels that each returned host must include.

### Read-Only

- `hosts` (List of String) List of registered host IDs.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
